lead_paragraph: As if the Mets do not already have enough problems, there is now some uncomfortable ambiguity surrounding the rotation as the team heads into three-game series at Atlanta and at Philadelphia.
snippet: Mets Manager Jerry Manuel said he might be inclined to skip Jon Niese's turn in the rotation this week.

headline.main: After Rough Start, Niese May Be Skipped

abstract: Mets Manager Jerry Manuel said he might be inclined to skip Jon Niese's turn in the rotation this week.
